H0.text: what kind of fish live in the salton sea. Mozambique Cichlid

H1.text: what kind of fish live in the salton sea. Gulf Killifish

H2.text: what kind of fish live in the salton sea. Desert Pupfish

H3.text: what kind of fish live in the salton sea. tilapia

A4.text: The desert pupfish occurs in the Salton Sea in California.

A5.text: The desert pupfish has been preyed upon and displaced by non-native fishes, such as tilapia.

A6.text: Introduced tilapia (hybrid Mozambique Ã— Wami) can tolerate the high salinity levels and pollution.
